named-query.name: BC_READ_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_TYPE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContentType FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContentType structuredContentType WHERE structuredContentType.name = :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_FIELDS_BY_CONTENT_ID
named-query.query: SELECT scField FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContentField scField LEFT JOIN FETCH scField.fieldDataList WHERE scField.structuredContent = :structuredContent

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME_AND_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.sandbox = :sandbox AND structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.activeStartDate >= :activeStartDate AND (structuredContent.activeEndDate <= :activeEndDate OR structuredContent.activeEndDate is null) AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.sandbox is null AND structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.activeStartDate >= :activeStartDate AND (structuredContent.activeEndDate <= :activeEndDate OR structuredContent.activeEndDate is null) AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false ORDER BY priority
